text: Keubit that jahe rugoe sileupah Nyang peugah sulet uroe kiamat Rugoe raya that hanaban peugah Hana meureumpok tanyoe ngon Tuhan Jikheun haba nyan sulet sileupah Hingga â€˜oh ban troh uroe kiamat Di jih ban mangat jipubuet salah Ban tanjo ka troh jikheun treuk meunoe Teulah that tanyoe rugoe sileupah Atra tapeugah uroe jeh hana Nyoe jinoe ka na pakri tapeubah Jime ngon dacha di ateuh rueng jih Geuhon that awih jih brat sileupah
